snippet: The state Corrections Department said Monday that it was postponing for 90 days the Wednesday execution of a man who murdered his 6-year-old stepson.
abstract: Louisiana Corrections Department says it is postponing for 90 days the execution of Christopher Sepulvado, who murdered his 6-year-old stepson, after changing its planned lethal injection method.
lead_paragraph: The state Corrections Department said Monday that it was postponing for 90 days the Wednesday execution of a man who murdered his 6-year-old stepson.

headline.main: Louisiana: Execution Delayed as Drugs Are Studied
headline.print_headline: Louisiana: Execution Delayed as Drugs Are Studied
